languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт молчит долгое время, вглядываясь в лицо стоящего напротив провидца. Он спокоен и собран и, кажется, готов принять свою судьбу. Наконец, Ирлиэт отвечает:{/n} "Ты прав, элантах. Он заслуживает участь многим ужаснее быстрой смерти. Но я не могу позволить ему покинуть этот мир, не искупив вину".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ирлиэт молчит долгое время, вглядываясь в лицо стоящего напротив провидца. Он спокоен и собран и, кажется, готов принять свою судьбу. Наконец, Ирлиэт отвечает:{/n} "Ты прав, элантах. Он заслуживает участь многим ужаснее быстрой смерти. Но я не могу позволить ему покинуть этот мир, не искупив вину".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet stays silent for a long time, peering into the face of the Farseer standing across from her. Calm and collected, he looks prepared to meet his fate. Finally, Yrliet replies,{/n} "You are right, elantach. He deserves a fate much more terrible than a quick death. But I cannot allow him to leave this world without atoning for his guilt."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт молчит долгое время, вглядываясь в лицо стоящего напротив провидца. Он спокоен и собран и, кажется, готов принять свою судьбу. languages.text: {n}Yrliet permanece en silencio durante un largo rato, escudriñando el rostro del vidente que tiene delante. Está tranquilo y sosegado, dispuesto a afrontar su destino. Finalmente, Yrliet responde.{/n} «Tienes razón, elantach. Una muerte rápida es un destino demasiado benévolo para él. Pero no puedo permitir que abandone este mundo sin expiar su culpa».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet stays silent for a long time, peering into the face of the Farseer standing across from her. Calm and collected, he looks prepared to meet his fate. Finally, Yrliet replies,{/n} "You are right, elantach. He deserves a fate much more terrible than a quick death. But I cannot allow him to leave this world without atoning for his guilt."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet permanece en silencio durante un largo rato, escudriñando el rostro del vidente que tiene delante. Está tranquilo y sosegado, dispuesto a afrontar su destino. Finalmente, Yrliet responde.{/n} «Tienes razón, elantach. Una muerte rápida es un destino demasiado benévolo para él. Pero no puedo permitir que abandone este mundo sin expiar su culpa».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは長く沈黙したまま、向かいに立つ先見司の顔をじっと見ている。落ち着いた様子の先見司は、自分の死を覚悟しているようだ。最後にユリエットは答えた。{/n}「あなたの言う通りだ、エランタ。彼は速やかな死よりももっと恐ろしい罰を味わうべきだ。だが罪を償う前にこの世を去るのは我が許さない」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet stays silent for a long time, peering into the face of the Farseer standing across from her. Calm and collected, he looks prepared to meet his fate. Finally, Yrliet replies,{/n} "You are right, elantach. He deserves a fate much more terrible than a quick death. But I cannot allow him to leave this world without atoning for his guilt."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは長く沈黙したまま、向かいに立つ先見司の顔をじっと見ている。落ち着いた様子の先見司は、自分の死を覚悟しているようだ。最後にユリエットは答えた。{/n}「あなたの言う通りだ、エランタ。彼は速やかな死よりももっと恐ろしい罰を味わうべきだ。だが罪を償う前にこの世を去るのは我が許さない」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特沉默了很长时间，凝视着站在她面前的先知，而先知镇定自若，似乎已准备好迎接自己的命运。到最后，伊莉耶特开了口。{/n}“你说得没错，外界人。他应该遭受比死亡更可怕的命运，但我不能让他不赎罪就离开这个世界。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet stays silent for a long time, peering into the face of the Farseer standing across from her. Calm and collected, he looks prepared to meet his fate. Finally, Yrliet replies,{/n} "You are right, elantach. He deserves a fate much more terrible than a quick death. But I cannot allow him to leave this world without atoning for his guilt."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特沉默了很长时间，凝视着站在她面前的先知，而先知镇定自若，似乎已准备好迎接自己的命运。到最后，伊莉耶特开了口。{/n}“你说得没错，外界人。他应该遭受比死亡更可怕的命运，但我不能让他不赎罪就离开这个世界。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet garde le silence un long moment, scrutant le visage du Grand Prophète qui lui fait face. Calme, il semble prêt à accepter son sort. Enfin, Yrliet répond :{/n} « Vous avez raison, elantach. Il mérite un sort bien plus terrible qu'une mort rapide. Mais je ne peux pas lui permettre de quitter ce monde sans expier ses péchés. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet stays silent for a long time, peering into the face of the Farseer standing across from her. Calm and collected, he looks prepared to meet his fate. Finally, Yrliet replies,{/n} "You are right, elantach. He deserves a fate much more terrible than a quick death. But I cannot allow him to leave this world without atoning for his guilt."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet garde le silence un long moment, scrutant le visage du Grand Prophète qui lui fait face. Calme, il semble prêt à accepter son sort. Enfin, Yrliet répond :{/n} « Vous avez raison, elantach. Il mérite un sort bien plus terrible qu'une mort rapide. Mais je ne peux pas lui permettre de quitter ce monde sans expier ses péchés. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Lange schweigt Yrliet und blickt ins Gesicht des Runenpropheten ihr gegenüber. Angesichts seines Schicksals wirkt er ruhig und gefasst. Schließlich antwortet Yrliet:{/n} "Ihr habt recht, Elantach. Er verdient ein viel schlimmeres Schicksal als einen schnellen Tod. Aber ich darf nicht zulassen, dass er diese Welt verlässt, ohne für seine Schuld zu sühnen."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet stays silent for a long time, peering into the face of the Farseer standing across from her. Calm and collected, he looks prepared to meet his fate. Finally, Yrliet replies,{/n} "You are right, elantach. He deserves a fate much more terrible than a quick death. But I cannot allow him to leave this world without atoning for his guilt."

traits.locale_text: {n}Lange schweigt Yrliet und blickt ins Gesicht des Runenpropheten ihr gegenüber. Angesichts seines Schicksals wirkt er ruhig und gefasst. Schließlich antwortet Yrliet:{/n} "Ihr habt recht, Elantach. Er verdient ein viel schlimmeres Schicksal als einen schnellen Tod. Aber ich darf nicht zulassen, dass er diese Welt verlässt, ohne für seine Schuld zu sühnen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, uzun bir müddet sessiz kalıyor. Dikkatle karşısında duran Ötesezen'in yüzüne bakıyor. Sakinleşip kendine gelen Ötesezen, kaderine boyun eğmeye hazır duruyor. Yrliet, en sonunda yanıt veriyor.{/n} "Haklısın elantach. Hızlı bir ölümden de beter bir kaderi hak ediyor. Ancak kefaretini ödemeden bu dünyadan ayrılmasına izin veremem."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet stays silent for a long time, peering into the face of the Farseer standing across from her. Calm and collected, he looks prepared to meet his fate. Finally, Yrliet replies,{/n} "You are right, elantach. He deserves a fate much more terrible than a quick death. But I cannot allow him to leave this world without atoning for his guilt."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet, uzun bir müddet sessiz kalıyor. Dikkatle karşısında duran Ötesezen'in yüzüne bakıyor. Sakinleşip kendine gelen kaderine boyun eğmeye hazır duruyor. Yrliet, en sonunda yanıt veriyor.{/n} "Haklısın elantach. Hızlı bir ölümden de beter bir kaderi hak ediyor. Ancak kefaretini ödemeden önce bu dünyayı terk etmesine izin veremem."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
